alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:47AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Hanover and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 650 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Supply to Myrtle Grove. These storms were moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Frequent Lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on poorly drained roads and low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, Ocean Crest Pier, North Masonboro Island, Figure Eight Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Bishop, Civie Town, Hightsville, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Supply and Brunswick County Community College Main Campus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 near mile marker 416. Interstate 140 US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 17 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
